remixlab.proscene

Enum Scene.ClickAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Scene.ClickAction>
      • remixlab.proscene.Scene.ClickAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Scene.ClickAction>
    Enclosing class:
    Scene

    public static enum Scene.ClickAction
extends java.lang.Enum<Scene.ClickAction>
    This enum defines mouse click actions to be binded to the mouse. Actions are defined here, but bindings are defined at the CameraProfile level, i.e., the scene acts like a bridge between the CameraProfile and proscene low-level classes.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ALIGN_CAMERA
      Align camera with world
      ALIGN_FRAME
      Align interactive frame (if any) with world
      ARP_FROM_PIXEL
      Set the arcball reference point from the pixel under the mouse
      CENTER_FRAME
      Center frame
      CENTER_SCENE
      Center scene
      NO_CLICK_ACTION
      No click action.
      RESET_ARP
      Reset the arcball reference point to the 3d frame world origin
      SHOW_ALL
      Show the whole scene
      ZOOM_ON_PIXEL
      Zoom on pixel
      ZOOM_TO_FIT
      Zoom to fit the scene
